name: Huggy Waggy Platformer
description:
Your goal is to rescue poor Huggy Waggy from imprisonment in a cave!

To do this, you will need to use these buttons:

Character Movement - WASD / Arrows

Jump - Space

Rebooting the - R/K level

What do cubes do?

White cube - falls after a certain time if you step on it.

The blue cube is an obstacle for the player to destroy it, just click on it with the left mouse button.

The red stripe is dangerous for the player, if you step on the red stripe, the level will instantly restart.
